Class ArrayListMatrix

  labo5.ArrayListMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdjacencyMatrix
public class ArrayListMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdjacencyMatrix

Simple implementation of the AdjacencyMatrix using ArrayLists.

Author:
Florian Poulin (florian.poulin at heig-vd.ch)

addLast

public int addLast()
Description copied from interface: AdjacencyMatrix
Dynamically adds an element to the end of the matrix. This will add a new row and a new column at the end of the matrix with all cells initialized to 0.

Specified by:
addLast in interface AdjacencyMatrix
Returns:
Index of the newly created row and column (same for both).
